file_content.text: Where's Skavak? I'd like a chat.
He took a shuttle offworld to get supplies. Please don't kill me!
My name's Vonddado Briimyo. I fix starships. Skavak kidnapped me.
One minute, we were drinking Corellian whiskey at the cantina. The next, I was his prisoner!
You got suckered by one of the galaxy's great con artists.
That's classic Skavak.
Humans are all so adorable-looking. I can never tell the good ones from the bad.
Never drink with someone you don't know.
Hope you learned your lesson.
After this, I'll never drink again!
You gullible fool.
Skavak slipped something in my drink! When I woke up, we were on Alderaan.
I heard you and Skavak arguing on the ship's holo. You want the Arkanian hyperdrive? Take it!
The spaceport comm channel announced there's a shuttle leaving in a few minutes. I can be on it if I hurry.
Give me the hyperdrive and you can go.
Then hurry.
You're not going anywhere until you junk Skavak's starship for me.
Sabotage this ship.
But that will take too long! I'll miss the shuttle.
Fine, get out of here.
Oh, all right.
The hyperdrive is all yours. Thanks for freeing me.
There's another shuttle soon.
Don't worry about that.
That's easy for you to say!
It could be worse.
All right, all right! Don't point that thing at me!
I'll fry the ship's power couplings and trash its sensor arrays. That'll ground Skavak....
There, I did like you asked. Can I please go?
Thanks for the help. You can go.
Sure.
Get out of here.
I hope there's another shuttle leaving soon. This isn't a friendly place for non-humans to hide out.
The hyperdrive is all yours. Goodbye!
You're going--in a manner of speaking....
Sort of. [Kill him.]
No witnesses. [Kill him.]
Aaah!
That was cruel!
He could've told people about us.
But necessary.
Yeah, so?
Don't ever question my judgment again.
Nobody asked you.
This place stinks of death. You have the hyperdrive. Let's go.
What was the point of that, Captain?
He could've been lying.
I didn't trust him.
Yeah, you go on tellin' yourself that.
It was too risky to leave him alive.
Self-preservation.
He didn't seem the type to rat us out.
Because I said so.
Learning more about you every day--unfortunately.
Let's get that blasted hyperdrive out of here before someone else comes.
That's... not fair....
Don't shoot! I'm not with those guys!
